short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Categorise YouTube content for Vod campaigns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficient categorisation of YouTube videos via manual auditing using this extension. It provides a small form for our private users to capture video details.
